questions:

B) Daily life and people
C) Urban infrastructure
D) Wildlife and animals

B) At the beach
C) Inside a tunnel 
D) In a residential area

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) Trees and vegetation
B) People walking
C) Ceiling lights and road
D) Animals in the wild

A) A large tree
B) A group of people
C) The road and ceiling lights
D) An animal

B) A beach
C) The exit/entry of the tunnel and outside area

B) Pedestrians
